rules_text:
Creatures your opponents control get -1/-0.
{1}{U}, Sacrifice Forged Documents: Draw a card.
notes:
Clue Cycle
Forged Documents is also sweet artifact-clue. I'm not seeing why the forged documents make the opponent weaker? it seems like it should let you get into places you shouldn't get into to me. not a critical one. Also good choice for a clue item. Another good place for flavortext.
